term.title: azlactones

item.text: Oxazol-5(4H)-ones I, compounds derived by cyclization of N-acyl α-amino carboxylic acids, RC(=O)NHCR2C(=O)OH, through formal loss of the elements of water. 4-Hydrocarbylideneazlactones II are often referred to as 'unsaturated azlactones'. [image: Not defined]
